means: [医]藻菌类霉菌的一个亚纲，这类霉菌都有不同的孢子囊和由纤维素组成的细胞壁，由有两个鞭毛的孢子进行有性繁殖。该亚纲包括水霉目(Saprolegniales.)

sentence.Network_en: Oomycetes and chytrids ( sometimes called water molds ) produce motile, flagellated spores in sporangia.
sentence.Network_cn: 卵菌纲和壶菌在孢子囊中产生能动的带鞭毛的孢子.

sentence.Network_en: Of the six fungal classes only the oomycetes usually have a diploid vegetative state.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有卵菌纲通常有二倍体的营养状态.
